project.description: This test demonstrates a simple container based test. The test is run in a container, checking the python version (2.7) and a secondary check that passes or fails based on the build parameter BREAK_BUILD. Test results are published to jenkins via a nUnit XML file.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BREAK_BUILD
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Testing parameter, enable to break the build!

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: # run test 1 via local docker registry docker pull localhost:5000/canarie/test1 docker run -v ${WORKSPACE}:/workspace -e BREAK_BUILD=${BREAK_BUILD} -t localhost:5000/canarie/test1
